verbs.description: perennialize (third-person singular simple present perennializes, present participle perennializing, simple past and past participle perennialized)

entries.meaning: (botany, intransitive) To return year after year as a perennial.
examples: I recommend spending your bulb budget on bulbs that will perennialize in the garden, and if you need big tulips, purchase a bunch from the local florist.
